SELECT iw.inventory_id AS id, iv.interval_bottom || ' > ' || GREATEST(we.measured_depth, we.vertical_depth) AS desc FROM inventory_well AS iw JOIN inventory AS iv ON iv.inventory_id = iw.inventory_id JOIN well AS we ON we.well_id = iw.well_id WHERE iv.active = true AND iv.interval_bottom IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(we.measured_depth, we.vertical_depth) IS NOT NULL AND GREATEST(we.measured_depth, we.vertical_depth) < iv.interval_bottom ORDER BY ( iv.interval_bottom - GREATEST(we.measured_depth, we.vertical_depth) ) DESC
